title: Council Decision of 25 October 1996 appointing a member of the Advisory Committee on Medical Training
header:
COUNCIL DECISION of 25 October 1996 appointing a member of  the Advisory Committee on Medical Training (96/C  331/02)
THE COUNCIL OF THE EUROPEAN UNION
recitals:
,
Having regard to Council Decision 75/364/EEC of 16 June 1975 setting up an Advisory Committee on  Medical Training  (1), and in particular Articles 3 and 4 thereof,
Whereas, in its Decision of 25 July 1994  (2), the Council appointed Mr J. BOEVÉ a member of the  Committee for the period ending 24 July 1997;
Whereas the Netherlands Government has nominated Mr A.  R. KOOMEN to replace Mr  J.  BOEVÉ,
main_body: Mr A.  R. KOOMEN is hereby appointed a member of the Advisory  Committee on Medical Training in place of Mr J. BOEVÉ for the remainder of the latter's term of  office, which ends on 24 July 1997.
attachments:
Done at Luxembourg, 25 October 1996.
For the Council The President E. KENNY
(1) OJ No L 167, 30. 6. 1975, p. 17.
(2) OJ No C 221, 9. 8. 1994, p. 1.
